name: SignMessageLib
description: SignMessageLib - Allows to set an entry in the signedMessages.

eventDecorators.name: SignMsg
eventDecorators.description: 修改盲盒 boxIndex：盲盒索引 startTime：盲盒生效时间 endTime：盲盒失效时间.

functionDecorators.name: getMessageHash
functionDecorators.description: Returns hash of a message that can be signed by owners.

functionDecorators.name: signMessage
functionDecorators.description: Marks a message (`_data`) as signed. Marks a message as signed, so that it can be used with EIP-1271.

parameterDecorators.name: _data
parameterDecorators.description: Arbitrary length data that should be marked as signed on the behalf of address(this).
